meanings.definition: A window in a shop displaying goods for sale.
meanings.sent1: The shopwindow had beautiful dresses on mannequins.
meanings.sent2: I always stop to look at the shopwindow when I walk by the store.
meanings.sent3: The shopwindow looked like a colorful painting with all the items on display.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a shopwindow, revealing all her emotions for everyone to see.
meanings.sent5: The shopwindow sparkled in the sunlight, drawing customers in with its enticing display.

meanings.definition: To display goods in a shop window.
meanings.sent1: The boutique owner would shopwindow the new arrivals every week.
meanings.sent2: Shopwindowing the products effectively can attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: She decided to shopwindow the handmade jewelry in a creative way.
meanings.sent4: The artist shopwindowed his paintings in the gallery, hoping to catch the eye of art enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The department store always shopwindows their latest deals to entice shoppers passing by.
